name: Flu Shot Shortage (25 player)
descr: Defeat Festergut while none of the players in your raid group ever had 3 stacks of Inoculated in 25-player mode.
tooltip:
Flu Shot Shortage (25 player)

Defeat Festergut while none of the players in your raid group ever had 3 stacks of Inoculated in 25-player mode.
